Title: Saint Laurent
Writer: Bertrand Bonello (screenplay), Thomas Bidegain (screenplay), Thomas Bidegain (dialogue), Bertrand Bonello (dialogue)
Actors: Gaspard Ulliel, Jérémie Renier, Louis Garrel, Léa Seydoux
Plot: Yves Saint Laurent's life from 1967 to 1976, during which time the famed fashion designer was at the peak of his career.
